subject: Re: name of the test
msgSnippet: It cannot. What you might want to do, is to manually set in an instance variable which test is running, and later check that instance variable in the @After
messageBody:
It cannot.

What you might want to do, is to manually set in an instance variable which test is running,
and later check that instance variable in the @After method. Of course, for that you must
add an additional line of code to each test method which repeats the name of the method,
but you can possibly get any closer.

cheers,
AA
